title: Prime-Line H 3552 5-3/8 In. Universal Break-Off Link (Single Pack)
features: Adjusts from 1-13/16 inch to 5-5/16 inch hole centers
Please refer to the line art drawing for dimensions and compare with your needs before ordering
description: This is a universal break-off link arm that makes it possible to adapt to whatever length link arm is needed when installing a louver or jalousie operator. Made of cadmium plated steel, it has break-off points between holes every 1/2 inch. This allows for a range from 1-13/16 inch to 5-5/16 inch in length. Any one of the lengths in between this range will be adequate for most situations.
Break-off link is designed to be used with most jalousie operators to provide many selections for linkage hole patterns; cadmium plated steel; adjustment holes at 1/2 In. spacing.
